A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Static characters that overcome no real internal struggles. A weak plot with Swiss cheese. Unnecessary humor poorly executed. If you're checking your social justice check-boxes for the critics\, I suppose that's another comment.  The film is void of quality writing and thoughtful consideration. It's two and a half hours long and trust me\, it feels two and a half hours long.\n\nThe audience score reflects the real pulse of this film. The movie is rotten.
